markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ratfolk Growth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2433) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ratfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=234" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 55 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle. You can cast [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102) as a 6th-level primal innate spell once per day. You can target only yourself and other ratfolk with this spell.
name: Ratfolk Growth
